name: .18 Derringer
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +2 Combat check
.18 Derringer cannot be lost or stolen unless you choose to allow it.
Hands: 1

name: .38 Revolver
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +3 Combat check
Hands: 1

name: .45 Automatic
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +4 Combat check
Hands: 1

name: .357 Magnum
expansion: The Black Goat of the Woods
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Upkeep: .357 Magnum does not refresh unless you spend $1.
Hands: 1
Any: Exhaust to gain +5 to Combat checks until the end of this combat.

name: Ancient Tome
description:
Type: Tome
Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-1) check.  If you pass, draw 1 Spell and discard Ancient Tome.  If you fail, nothing happens.

name: Athame
description:
Type: Physical weapon
+1 to Combat check
+3 instead if opponent has Magical Resistance
+6 instead if opponent has Magical Immunity
Hands: 1

name: Axe
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +2 Combat check (+3 instead if your other hand is empty)
Hands: 1

name: Brass Knuckles
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +1 Combat check
Hands: Handless

name: Bullwhip
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +1 Combat check
Hands: 1
Any: Exhaust to re-roll 1 die after making a Combat check.

name: Carbine Rifle
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Hands: 1
Any: Exhaust before making a Combat check to gain +5 to that check.

name: Cavalry Saber
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +2 Combat check
Hands: 1

name: Courier Run
description: Type: Task

name: Cross
description:
Type: Magical weapon
+0 Combat check (+3 if Opponent is Undead)
+1 Horror check
Hands: 1

name: Crowbar
expansion: The Black Goat of the Woods
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +2 to Combat checks
Hands: 1
Movement: Discard Crowbar to make a Sneak (-2) check.  Draw a Common item for each success you roll.  If you fail, you are arrested.

name: Dark Cloak
description: Bonus: +1 Evade check

name: Director's Diary
description:
Type: Tome
Any: Discard this card when the terror level is increased to reduce the amount by which it is being increased by 1.

name: Dusty Manuscripts
description:
Type: Tome
Bonus: +1 Spell check

name: Dynamite
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +8 Combat check (Discard after use)
Hands: 2

name: Elephant Gun
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Upkeep: Elephant Gun does not refresh unless you spend $2.
Any: Exhaust before making a Combat check to gain +8 to that check.

name: Fine Clothing
description:
Bonus: +1 to all skill checks during Arkham encounters.
Discard Fine Clothing when you lose any amount of Stamina.

name: Flamethrower
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Hands: 2
Any: Exhaust before making a Combat check to gain +7 to that check.

name: Flare Gun
description: Movement: Discard Flare Gun while in a street area to move all monsters in the Sky to your location.

name: Food
description: Any: Discard Food to reduce any Stamina loss by 1.

name: Food
description: Any: Discard Food to reduce any Stamina loss by 1.

name: Genealogy Research
description: Type: Task

name: Gray's Anatomy
expansion: The Black Goat of the Woods
description: Arkham Encounters: Exhaust when spending a monster trophy to increase the toughness value of that trophy by 1.

name: Hand Camera
description: Any Phase: Discard Hand Camera after you gain a Clue token to gain 1 additional Clue token. When you do so, one other investigator of your choice also gains 1 Clue token.

name: Handcuffs
description: Any: Exhaust before making a Combat check against a Cultist, Tcho-tcho, Ghoul, or Maniac to automatically pass that check and gain 1 Sanity.

name: Kerosene
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Upkeep: Kerosene does not refresh unless you spend $1
Hands: 1
Any: Exhaust before making a Combat check to gain +4 to that check.

name: King James Bible
description:
Type: Tome
Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to regain 1 Sanity and gain +1 to Horror checks until the end of the turn.

name: Knife
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +1 Combat check
Hands: 1

name: Lantern
description: Bonus: +1 to Luck checks.

name: Ley Line Map
description: You may ignore all penalties to Skill checks caused by Environment Mythos cards.

name: Lucky Cigarette Case
description: Any: Discard Lucky Cigarette Case to re-roll any one Skill check.

name: Lucky Rabbit's Foot
expansion: The Black Goat of the Woods
description:
Arkham Encounters:  After you draw an encounter card, exhaust and discard Lucky Rabbit's Foot to draw a different encounter card.
Any: Exhaust to gain +1 to a Luck check.

name: Magnifying Glass
expansion: The Black Goat of the Woods
description:
Any phase:  Exhaust and discard after you gain a Clue token to gain 1 additional Clue token.
Movement: Exhaust to gain +2 to Lore checks when reading Tomes.

name: Makeup Kit
description:
Bonus: +1 Will check (but not Horror checks)
Any: Discard Makeup Kit to avoid being arrested.

name: Map of Arkham
description: Movement phase: Exhaust to get 1 extra movement point.

name: Military Motorcycle
expansion: The Black Goat of the Woods
description:
Bonus: +1 to Evade checks.
Movement: Exhaust to gain 2 extra movement points.

name: Mineralogy Report
description: Type: Task

name: Molotov Cocktail
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +6 Combat check (Discard after use)
Hands: 1

name: Motorcycle
description: Movement: Exhaust to get 2 extra movement points.

name: Newspaper Assignment
description: Type: Task

name: Old Journal
description:
Type: Tome
Movement: Exhaust and spend 1 movement point to make a Lore (-1) check.  If you pass, gain 3 Clue tokens and discard Old Journal.  If you fail, nothing happens.

name: Patrolling the Streets
description: Type: Task

name: Press Pass
description: Any: Exhaust when you gain one or more Clue tokens to gain 1 extra Clue token.

name: Research Materials
description: Any: Discard Research Materials instead of spending 1 Clue token.

name: Rifle
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +5 Combat check
Hands: 2

name: Safety Deposit Key
description: Movement: Spend 1 movement point and discard this card while in the Bank of Arkham to make a Luck (-2) check.  If you succeed, draw 1 Unique item.  If you fail, gain 2 Clue tokens.

name: Sedanette
description: You may automatically Evade monsters of toughness 1 while in the street.

name: Shotgun
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +4 Combat check
Hands: 2
Any Phase: When using Shotgun in Combat, all 6's rolled count as 2 successes.

name: Sledgehammer
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +3 to Combat checks and +1 to Fight checks.
Reduce the toughness of monsters you fight by 1 to a minimum of 1 (this does not affect their value as trophies).
Hands: 2

name: Student Newspaper
expansion: The Black Goat of the Woods
description: Movement: Discard Student Newspaper to choose a Clue token in any location.  Take that Clue token.

name: Telescope
description:
Bonus: +1 Sneak check (but not Evade checks)
Any: Discard Telescope to avoid being delayed.

name: Time Bomb
description:
Upkeep: If this card is on a location or street area, discard 1 Clue token from it.  If there are no Clue tokens left to discard, return all monsters in the location/area to the cup, reduce all investigators in the location/area to 0 Stamina, and discard this card.
Movement: You may place this card on your current Arkham location or street area with up to 3 Clue tokens from the bank on it.

name: Tommy Gun
description:
Type: Physical weapon
Bonus: +6 Combat check
Hands: 2

name: Understudy's Script
description:
Type: Tome
Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Will (-2) check.  If you pass, draw 1 Spell, gain 2 Clue tokens, and discard Understudy's Script.  If you fail, you lose 1 Sanity.

name: Whiskey
description: Any: Discard Whiskey to reduce any Sanity loss by 1.

name: Whiskey
description: Any: Discard Whiskey to reduce any Sanity loss by 1.
